en.drink-water-tips: Stay Hydrated! Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily.
en.wash-hands-tips: Wash your hands regularly to prevent infections.
en.get-sleep-tips: Ensure you get 7-8 hours of quality sleep every night.
en.eat-healthy-tips: Eat a balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, and whole grains.
en.exercise-tips: Engage in at least 30 minutes of physical activity daily.
en.health-checkup-tips: Take regular health check-ups to monitor your well-being.
en.hero-title: Excellence in Care, Trusted by Many
en.hero-subtitle: Providing 24x7 quality healthcare with compassion and excellence since 2020
en.mission-text: At Samad Nursing Home, we are committed to providing accessible, affordable, and quality healthcare services. Our experienced medical team works tirelessly to ensure every patient receives personalized care with dignity and respect.
en.value-compassion-desc: Treating every patient with empathy and understanding
en.value-excellence-desc: Maintaining highest standards of medical practice
en.value-community-desc: Dedicated to serving our local community
en.gallery-subtitle: Take a look at our modern healthcare facilities
en.reviews-subtitle: What our patients say about us
en.contact-subtitle: Find us easily and get in touch
en.address-english:
Samad Nursing Home
Hengaipur Road, Shahabuddinpur, Bilariyaganj
District Azamgarh, UttarPradesh, PIN: 276121
en.footer-description: Providing quality healthcare services to our rural community since 2020. Your health is our priority.
en.copyright: ┬й 2024 Samad Nursing Home. All rights reserved.
en.privacy-policy-intro: At Samad Nursing Home, we respect your privacy. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it.
en.privacy-policy-collection-body: We collect minimal personal information, such as your name, phone number, or email, only if you fill out a contact form or interact with us (e.g., WhatsApp messaging). We may also collect non-personal data through analytics to improve our website.
en.privacy-policy-use-body: Your information is used only to respond to your inquiries, provide requested services, or improve our website. We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties, except as required by law.
en.privacy-policy-protection-body: We use reasonable security measures to protect your data. However, no online system is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.
en.privacy-policy-contact-body: If you have any questions about your privacy, please contact us at khandannre@gmail.com.
en.terms-intro: By using the Samad Nursing Home website, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.
en.terms-user-body: You agree to use this website for lawful purposes only. Do not misuse the information or attempt to harm the website.
en.terms-liability-body: We strive to provide accurate information, but we do not guarantee completeness or accuracy. Samad Nursing Home is not liable for any damages resulting from the use of this website.
en.terms-ip-body: All content on this website, including text, images, and logos, is the property of Samad Nursing Home. Do not copy or use without permission.
en.terms-changes-body: We may update these terms at any time. Please check this page regularly for updates.
en.terms-contact-body: For questions about these terms, contact us at khandannre@gmail.com.
